name: JIBSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on my lamp”
”Alexa, turn on my TV”
”Alexa, turn on Lamp Room”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: To configure and control your JIB Smart Home Devices you can use the JIB Smart Home App, the application is available for Android (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jibhome.smart) and iOS (https://apps.apple.com/fr/app/jib-domotique-handicap/id1461763183). When you activate the Skill use the same login and password to connect with the devices that you have in you JIB account, JIB Smart Home provides you all the connected devices compatible with the application (https://jib-home.com/).
